data.comment: The match is underway in Genoa.
Romelu Lukaku of Inter is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Inter, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Genoa drive forward but Goran Pandev is judged offside.
Lautaro Martinez (Inter) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Free kick Genoa.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 13, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Inter's Lautaro Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 15, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Genoa.
Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Davide Massa awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Inter drive upfield and Arturo Vidal gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Genoa defender.
In the minute 27, Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa.
Inter's Romelu Lukaku is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Danilo D`Ambrosio (Inter) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Davide Massa signals a Inter throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Inter in the half of Genoa.
Important block from the Genoa defence as Lautaro Martinez fires in a strike for Inter.
Corner awarded to Inter.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 38, Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Genoa.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
At Luigi Ferraris, Lautaro Martinez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
In the minute 45, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Luigi Ferraris.
Luca Pellegrini is replacing Lennart Czyborra for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Inter.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Inter to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Inter in the half of Genoa.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter.
Free kick Genoa.
In the minute 51, Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Inter, close to Genoa's area.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Davide Massa signals a Inter throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 53, Genoa have a goal kick.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 55, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Nicolo Barella is on a sub for Christian Eriksen for Inter.
The away team have replaced Ivan Perisic with Achraf Hakimi. This is the second substitution made today by Antonio Conte.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa make their second substitution with Ivan Radovanovic replacing Valon Behrami.
In the minute 61, Rolando Maran (Genoa) is making a third substitution, with Miha Zajc replacing Milan Badelj.
Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Genoa.
Goran Pandev for Genoa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 63, Inter have a goal kick.
Goal! Romelu Lukaku gives Inter a 0-1 lead in Genoa.
That's a fine assist from Nicolo Barella.
In the minute 65, Eldor Shomurodov is replacing Marko Pjaca for the home team.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 69, Romelu Lukaku for Inter is whistled offside.
Nicolo Barella (Inter) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 72, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Lautaro Martinez with Andrea Pinamonti.
In the minute 73, Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Inter's Marcelo Brozovic gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 79, Goal! Danilo D`Ambrosio extends Inter's lead to 0-2 in Genoa with a header.
Andrea Ranocchia instrumental with a fine assist.
Antonio Conte is making the team's fourth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Radja Nainggolan replacing Arturo Vidal.
Davide Massa awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Aleksandar Kolarov is replacing Matteo Darmian for Inter at Luigi Ferraris.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Inter are coming forward and Andrea Pinamonti gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Rolando Maran is making the team's fifth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Filippo Melegoni replacing Nicolo Rovella.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, In Genoa Genoa's Eldor Shomurodov is caught offside.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
In the minute 86, Inter to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Genoa.
Mattia Bani (Genoa) has received a yellow card from Davide Massa.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 88, Inter's Andrea Ranocchia attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Davide Massa signals a Genoa throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aleksandar Kolarov of Inter smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In Genoa Inter attack through Radja Nainggolan. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
